author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 54-year-old man was clubbed to death by a motorist after an argument broke out between the two in Kodungaiyur on Wednesday evening. According to police, A. Sekar of Kamaraj Salai in Kodungaiyur, a grocery store owner, was riding on Narayanasamy Garden Fifth Street in Kodungaiyur, when he was hit by another motorcyclist with a woman riding pillion.

An argument broke out between the two and in a fit of rage, the other motorcyclist picked up a log and hit Sekar on his head. “When he fell unconscious, the motorcyclist and the woman sped away,” a policeman said.

Police reached the spot after passersby informed them about the incident. Sekar was taken to a clinic nearby, where he was pronounced dead on arrival. His body was later sent to Stanley Medical College Hospital for post-mortem. A case has been registered and a search is on for the motorcyclist and the woman.
title: Man clubbed to death by motorcyclist
